title: Larry Kosilla of AMMO NYC
description:
Larry Kosilla is one of Matt's oldest friends; they grew up together in Westchester, NY, and went to middle school and high school together. They began the car industry together, founding the New York Motor Club in 2005, which is where Matt got started making videos. Now, Larry is one of the world's best car detailers, employed by corporations, celebrities, and titans of industries to keep fleets of classics looking their best. He also created a car care product line from scratch called AMMO NYC. Larry and Matt tell stories, talk about their project cars, and Larry answers your detailing questions.

This show is available as a video@

https://youtu.be/O3wlr-naQes

 
Use code 'TST' to get free shipping on any of Larry's AMMO NYC car care products from: 
http://www.ammonyc.com
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
